title: i need some help with this problem ive been having
body: i need some serious help and i dont know what to do when i open league its saying "update failed unspecified error occurred" please tell me how to fix this?

replies.body: If you're seeing that unspecified error as soon as the patcher opens, there's a chance that your OS doesn't have the right permissions in place to let it download the update. Check out our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for steps on how you can get those permissions in place.
OH and whenever i try to x it out it jsut pops up again
